text: He imandarasakala! Tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau te'omra raachulara prati imana ana. Te'om nija anugrahata tomalokaka dbiguna puraskara pradana karaiba arau te'om tomalokaka pradana karaiba nura, yara sahayata tomaloke caliba paraiba arau te'om tomalokaka ksama karaiba; arau allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu
